Html:
Hello!

First of all I'd like to thank you the developer for creating this awesome library, you saved my time (and my nerves).

I have a question about inserting image into an Excel spreadsheet which was created from the scratch. Is it possible to add it via Simple OOXML wrapper and if it is possible could you point me out where can I find more info about it.

Any help would be appreciated.

Thanks!

Hrvoje
